products.name: LA LAGARTIJA
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delciocious flavor.

products.name: EL TIGRE
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts caramel.

products.name: LA CUCARACHA
products.description: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavors. Carmel, gapes, strwaberry, you name it!. Its gret choice for warm summer days.
